about.details:
Incorporated in 1987, Aster DM Healthcare Ltd is Kochi, Kerala based healthcare service provider with operations in GCC states (United Arab Emirates, Oman, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Kuwait and Bahrain), India and the Philippines. Company’s Indian operations are headquartered in Kochi, Kerala.

Aster DM Healthcare operates in multiple segments of the healthcare industry including hospitals, clinics and retail pharmacies. Company operates hospitals and clinics, pharmacies, diagnostic centers, educational institutions, and healthcare management and healthcare support systems. Company provides healthcare services to patients across economic segments under brand names including "Aster", "Medcare" and "Access".

Aster's healthcare facilities consist of 9 hospitals, 90 clinics and 206 retail pharmacies in the GCC states, 10 multi-specialty hospitals and 7 clinics in India, and 1 clinic in the Philippines as of September 30, 2017. Aster's had 17,408 employees as of September 30, 2017, including 1,417 full time doctors, 5,797 nurses, 1,752 paramedics and 8,442 other employees (including pharmacists).

Aster's hospitals in India are located in Kochi, Kolhapur, Kozhikode, Kottakkal, Bengaluru, Vijayawada, Guntur, Wayanad and Hyderabad and are generally operated under the Aster, MIMS, Ramesh and Prime brands.

faqs.question: What is the Aster DM Healthcare IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aster DM Healthcare IPO is a main-board IPO of equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹980.14 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹190 per share. The minimum order quantity is 78.

The IPO opens on February 12, 2018, and closes on February 15, 2018.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE, NSE.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aster DM Healthcare IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aster DM Healthcare IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aster DM Healthcare IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aster DM Healthcare IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aster DM Healthcare IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aster DM Healthcare IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aster DM Healthcare IPO opens on February 12, 2018 and closes on February 15, 2018.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aster DM Healthcare IPO?
faqs.answer: Aster DM Healthcare IPO lot size is 78, and the minimum amount required is ₹14,820.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aster DM Healthcare IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aster DM Healthcare IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Aster DM Healthcare IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Aster DM Healthcare IPO will be done on Thursday, February 22, 2018, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, February 23, 2018. Check the Aster DM Healthcare IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Aster DM Healthcare IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Aster DM Healthcare IPO listing date is on Monday, February 26, 2018.
